references.type: full text of measure as introduced

actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Budget.
Committee on the Budget. Committee consideration and Mark Up Session held.
Committee on the Budget. Ordered to be reported without amendment unfavorably.
Committee on the Budget. Reported by Senator Conrad unfavorably without amendment. Without written report.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 219.
Measure laid before Senate by unanimous consent.
Failed of passage in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 1 - 99. Record Vote Number: 336.

official_title: A joint resolution suspending certain provisions of law pursuant to section 258(a)(2) of the Balanced Budget and Emergency Deficit Control Act of 1985.
popular_title: Suspend Spending and Tax-Cut Restraints Appropriations bill

summary.text: Declares that: (1) certain conditions under the Balanced Budget and Emergency Deficit Control Act of 1985 concerning low or negative economic growth for two consecutive quarters have been met; and (2) sequestration procedures under specified provisions of such Act and the Congressional Budget and Impoundment Control Act of 1974 are suspended.

titles.title: Suspend Spending and Tax-Cut Restraints Appropriations bill
A joint resolution suspending certain provisions of law pursuant to section 258(a)(2) of the Balanced Budget and Emergency Deficit Control Act of 1985.
